You have paid your respects
Many noble warriors are buried within the halls of Langraf.
You have found the second tomb. Pay your respects by <rgb=#FF0000>kneeling</rgb>
You have paid your respects
You have found the third tomb. Pay your respects by <rgb=#FF0000>kneeling</rgb>

'The Rohirrim have forgotten and lost more knowledge about battle than we shall ever know. Great victories have been won that are little more than tattered memories. We are only here because of the sacrifices of those who came before.\n\n'Head into Langraf and honour the fallen who have fought the battles that we now take for granted. Find their tombs and kneel before them.'
The tombs can be found within Langraf.\n\nWaldeg has asked you to venture into Langraf, find the tombs of his ancestors, and honour them by kneeling before them.
'Perhaps one day, someone may honour us in these same ways.'
Waldeg is at Snowbourn.\n\nWaldeg will be pleased to hear that you honoured his ancestors and remembered their sacrifice.
'Langraf is a sacred place for my people: treat it with care and respect.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Pay your respects at the first tomb
Pay your respects at the second tomb
Pay your respects at the third tomb
Talk to Waldeg
Langraf: Honouring the Ancients
